attributes.action: Leave The Eurozone Completely And Regulate Immigration
attributes.additional_details:
At an approximate cost of 13bn Euros per year, why should the uk keep paying in to bail other people out. Not once has the country actually got more out then it paid in, why shouldn't we concentrate on creating more jobs a better healthcare system and a better country.

Why are we not more like Canada, The Usa, Austrailia who only let in people who actually crontribute to the economy. Its time for a Change.

Give back to your people, stop taking off us.
